title: Supervised star, galaxy, and QSO classification with sharpened dimensionality reduction
details: MAA Lourens, SC Trager, Y Kim, AC Telea, J Roerdink - Astronomy & Astrophysics, 2024
abstract: Aims. We explored the use of broadband colors to classify stars, galaxies, and quasi- stellar objects (QSOs). Specifically, we applied sharpened dimensionality reduction (SDR)-aided classification to this problem, with the aim of enhancing cluster …

title: A mechanistically interpretable neural network for regulatory genomics
details: AM Tseng, G Eraslan, T Biancalani, G Scalia - arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.06211, 2024
abstract: Deep neural networks excel in mapping genomic DNA sequences to associated readouts (eg, protein-DNA binding). Beyond prediction, the goal of these networks is to reveal to scientists the underlying motifs (and their syntax) which drive genome …
